feature: Open existing file via keyboard shortcut
user_story: As a macOS text editor user, I want to open an existing text file with Cmd+O so I can load and edit files from disk quickly.
acceptance_criteria: Cmd+O triggers a native file-open dialog
Selecting a file opens a tab containing the file's current text content
Opening a file already in tabs focuses that tab instead of creating a duplicate
Canceling the file-open dialog makes no state changes
Auto-save must not attempt to write placeholder untitled tabs
